> <OLD>
>
> There was a nod from WHEELIE as RODIMUS was made to lay down and he walked
> out.  For this moment, his options were limited.  He could not leave
> Rodimus, and without further assistance he could not contact the MAXIMALS
> due to the jamming field that was covering the entire basin and area.
>
> At this point, he also could not ask those who lived here for further help,
> not wanting to risk them being a target or making them take sides over in
> this war.
>
> And also getting the 'suggestio' over from UNUS over towards RODIMUS,
> wondering just why they were so strongly but keeping quiet as he spoke to
> RODIMUS, "Yes, rest.  Your friends will be around soon.  Don't succumb to
> gloom and doom."
>
> Waiting for UNUS to tell him where to go now, not wanting to do anything
> aggressive, and filing away the information on SABERBACK and MAGMATRON to
> tell them as soon as he could, as well as a possible third army, and an
> outpost of escaped neutrals.

<NEW>

UNUS nodded as he left the room, followed by ASTRA and FIREHORN and
presumably WHEELIE as well.

As they did so another soldier, one looking like all the rest of them
came up qickly to UNUS and spoke into his ear.

UNUS nodded as he looked curiously at WHEELIE and the symbol that he wore.

When the other soldier reached an end of whatever he was saying UNUS
clapped him on the shoulder, "You have done well Darkhoof." he said.

Turning to look at WHEELIE there was a smile on UNUS' face, "It would
seem that there is another of your kind in here looking as well, a
silver dragon of some kind? He has the other symbol that your friend
described." Of course talking about the Maximal symbol.

UNUS looked at DARKHOOF and then back at WHEELIE, "Somehow he ended up
fighting Grimlock and his men." His tone was dark as he talked. "They
patrol the jungle looking for stragglers to pick off. From what I'm
told he was able to hide your companion and distract him, but I don't
think your friend came alone."

DARKHOOF nodded and took up the narrative at a gesture from UNUS,
"There were others." DARKHOOF said calmly, although there was a
tiredness in his voice. "I couldn't couln't get close enough to see
their symbol, but one turned into a black wheeled vehicle like you and
your other friend." Evidently DARKHOOF knew of RODIMUS.

he continued, "Grimlock went after them. One of them got hurt, the
vehicled one I believe, but they made it back their craft."

FIREHORN nodded, "Grimlock and his team are tough, but not all that fast."

UNUS looked at WHEELIE, "Does any of this sound familar?"

(TAG)

Preston
